template_info.name: Fortress Stall Meta
template_info.description: A defensive competitive team that wins through attrition, status damage, and superior longevity
template_info.usage_notes: This team focuses on outlasting opponents through superior bulk, recovery, and gradual damage. Patience and prediction are key.

pokemon.name: chansey
pokemon.strategy: Ultimate special wall with team cleric support
pokemon.tips: Aromatherapy keeps your team healthy while Toxic wears down enemies

pokemon.name: snorlax
pokemon.strategy: Immovable physical wall with setup potential
pokemon.tips: Curse boosts attack and defense while lowering speed - perfect for stall

pokemon.name: lapras
pokemon.strategy: Bulky water type with team support and win condition
pokemon.tips: Perish Song forces switches and can win in endgame scenarios

pokemon.name: cloyster
pokemon.strategy: Entry hazard control with defensive utility
pokemon.tips: Spikes pressure switches while Rapid Spin clears opponent hazards

pokemon.name: slowbro
pokemon.strategy: Physical wall with special attack potential
pokemon.tips: Amnesia makes it nearly immune to special attacks after setup

pokemon.name: articuno
pokemon.strategy: Legendary special wall with status spreading
pokemon.tips: Legendary stats make it extremely bulky on the special side
